choice.title: PyAudio 0.2.7 for MacPython 3.2
choice.description: MacPython 3.2 is available from python.org and is typically installed in /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/.

choice.title: PyAudio 0.2.7 for MacPython 2.7
choice.description: MacPython 2.7 is available from python.org and is typically installed in /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/.

choice.title: PyAudio 0.2.7 for System Python 2.7
choice.description: System Python 2.7 is installed by default in Mac OS X.

choice.title: PyAudio 0.2.7 for System Python 2.6
choice.description: System Python 2.6 is installed by default in Mac OS X.

choice.title: PyAudio 0.2.7 for MacPython 3.3
choice.description: MacPython 3.3 is available from python.org and is typically installed in /Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/.
